extendedInfo.description: ROTAX Engine Tuner allows you to calibrate your Rotax Max engine in an optimal way according to the environmental conditions (temperature, pressure and humidity).Location can be obtained via 3G, WiFi or GPS, and metheorological conditions are loaded automatically once location has been determined. All this parameters can also be introduced manually.Once you enter these values, the app calculates and shows the optimal calibration parameters for your engine.IMPORTANT NOTE: Weather conditions are obtained automatically from worldweatheronline.com, so you need a working internet connection (either 3G or WiFi) to obtain them.[Disclaimer: this app is not endorsed nor officially supported by BRP Inc.]
